name: RAIDiator
tagline: A simple Programm to Calculate HDD-Space usage with different RAID Levels
body:
##About

![](http://s27.postimg.org/s8lupwnxb/RAIDiator.png)

RAIDiator can be used to compare various RAID-configurations.
RAIDiator can calculate:
* The usable space for a certain RAID-configuration.
* The not usable and thatway wasted space.
* The ratio of usable and not usable space shown as a pie-diagram.

More features are comming!

![](http://s24.postimg.org/yg7w2oe2t/Unbenannt.png)

## Authors and Contributors
@jcambass

## Support or Contact
For feature requests, questions and feedback please use the issue feature in GitHub.
